title: [FF2-001] Fix TypeScript Errors in Services Layer
body:
## Task
Fix all TypeScript errors in src/services directory

## Current Status
- Errors: 400+ in services
- Priority: HIGH

## Agent Assignment
- Type: code-implementer
- Instance: 1

## Success Criteria
- Zero TypeScript errors in services/

title: [FF2-004] Performance Optimization
body:
## Task

## Success Criteria

- Optimize lazy loading

title: [FF2-005] Security Hardening
body:

title: [FF2-006] Test Coverage Validation
body:

- All tests pass
